verses.verse: <S%G2919>Judge<s%> not, that you be not judged. <S%G2919><s%>

For with <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> you <S%G2919>judge,<s%> you shall be <S%G2919>judged:<s%> and with <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> you <S%G3354>mete,<s%> it shall be <S%G488>measured<s%> to you again. <S%G488><s%>

And <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G991>behold<s%> you the <S%G2595>mote<s%> that is in your <S%G80>brother's<s%> <S%G3788>eye,<s%> but <S%G2657>consider<s%> not the <S%G1385>beam<s%> that is in <S%G4674>your<s%> own eye? <S%G3788><s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will you <S%G2046>say<s%> to your <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G863>Let<s%> me <S%G1544>pull<s%> out the <S%G2595>mote<s%> out of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eye;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a beam <S%G1385><s%> is in <S%G4675>your<s%> own eye? <S%G3788><s%>

You <S%G5273>hypocrite,<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G1385>beam<s%> out of <S%G4675>your<s%> own <S%G3788>eye;<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall you <S%G1227>see<s%> <S%G1227>clearly<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G2595>mote<s%> out of your <S%G80>brother's<s%> eye. <S%G3788><s%>

<S%G1325>Give<s%> not that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%> to the <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> you <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3135>pearls<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G5519>swine,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G2662>trample<s%> them <S%G1722>under<s%> their <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G4762>turn<s%> <S%G4762>again<s%> and <S%G4486>rend<s%> you.
<S%G154>Ask,<s%> and it shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> you; <S%G2212>seek,<s%> and you shall <S%G2147>find;<s%> <S%G2925>knock,<s%> and it shall be <S%G455>opened<s%> to you:
For <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G154>asks<s%> <S%G2983>receives;<s%> and he that <S%G2212>seeks<s%> <S%G2147>finds;<s%> and to him that <S%G2925>knocks<s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is there of you, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> his <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> will he <S%G1929>give<s%> him a stone? <S%G3037><s%>
<S%G2532>Or<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G154>ask<s%> a <S%G2486>fish,<s%> will he <S%G1929>give<s%> him a serpent? <S%G3789><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> how to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> things to them that <S%G154>ask<s%> him?

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> you <S%G2309>would<s%> that <S%G444>men<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> to you, <S%G4160>do<s%> you <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> to them: for <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3551>law<s%> and the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G1525>Enter<s%> you in <S%G1223>at<s%> the <S%G4728>strait<s%> <S%G4439>gate:<s%> for wide <S%G4116><s%> is the <S%G4439>gate,<s%> and broad <S%G2149><s%> is the <S%G3598>way,<s%> that <S%G520>leads<s%> to <S%G684>destruction,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> there be <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1525>go<s%> in thereat: <S%G1223><s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> strait <S%G4728><s%> is the <S%G4439>gate,<s%> and narrow <S%G2346><s%> is the <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G520>leads<s%> to <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G3641>few<s%> there be that <S%G2147>find<s%> it.

<S%G4337>Beware<s%> of <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to you in <S%G4263>sheep's<s%> <S%G1742>clothing,<s%> but <S%G2081>inwardly<s%> they are <S%G727>ravening<s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>
You shall <S%G1921>know<s%> them by their <S%G2590>fruits.<s%> Do men <S%G4816>gather<s%> <S%G4718>grapes<s%> of <S%G173>thorns,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4810>figs<s%> of thistles? <S%G5146><s%>

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4160>brings<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> but a <S%G4550>corrupt<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4160>brings<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

A <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> can a <S%G4550>corrupt<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> that <S%G4160>brings<s%> not <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is <S%G1581>hewn<s%> <S%G1581>down,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the fire. <S%G4442><s%>
Why <S%G686><s%> <S%G1065><s%> by their <S%G2590>fruits<s%> you shall <S%G1921>know<s%> them.

Not <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> shall <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> but he that <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G4183>Many<s%> will <S%G2046>say<s%> to me in that <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> have we not <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> in your <S%G3686>name?<s%> and in your <S%G3686>name<s%> have <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils?<s%> and in your <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1411>wonderful<s%> works?
And <S%G5119>then<s%> will I <S%G3670>profess<s%> to them, I <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> you: <S%G672>depart<s%> from me, you that <S%G2038>work<s%> iniquity. <S%G458><s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3748><s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G3450>mine,<s%> and <S%G4160>does<s%> them, I will <S%G3666>liken<s%> him to a <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> on a rock: <S%G4073><s%>

And the <S%G1028>rain<s%> <S%G2597>descended,<s%> and the <S%G4215>floods<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G4154>blew,<s%> and <S%G4363>beat<s%> on that <S%G3614>house;<s%> and it <S%G4098>fell<s%> not: for it was <S%G2311>founded<s%> on a rock. <S%G4073><s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G3450>mine,<s%> and <S%G4160>does<s%> them not, shall be <S%G3666>likened<s%> to a <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> on the sand: <S%G285><s%>

And the <S%G1028>rain<s%> <S%G2597>descended,<s%> and the <S%G4215>floods<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G4154>blew,<s%> and <S%G4350>beat<s%> on that <S%G3614>house;<s%> and it <S%G4098>fell:<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> was the <S%G4431>fall<s%> of it.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4931>ended<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1322>doctrine:<s%>
For he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> them as one <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> and not as the <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>
